scripts.build: npx slidev build slide-hello-webcontainers.md --base /hello-webcontainers/ --out dist/hello-webcontainers && npx slidev build slide-hello-world.md --base /hello-world/ --out dist/hello-world && mv dist/hello-webcontainers/index.html dist/hello-webcontainers/index.md && cp index.html dist/
